structure.unit: FORMALITY AND ASSIGNABILITY OF CONTRACTS -- INSTALLMENT SALES CONTRACTS

law.text: KRS 371.110 to 371.150 do not apply to any national or state bank, or to any credit union or trust company.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4758a-5.
